text: I inherited a MESS and am in the process of fixing it.
Nobody knows the system better than me, which is why I alone can fix it.
Big changes are happening!
We will solve the problem without them!
Working hard!
Getting major things done!
We are already winning again
A great job done by amazing people!
They said technical difficulties!
I guarantee you there's no problem. I guarantee.
I'm not doing that to brag, because you know what? I don't have to brag. I don't have to, believe it or not.
I will absolutely apologize, sometime in the hopefully distant future, if I'm ever wrong.
Do not worry, we are in very  good shape!
Get smart and start winning again!
We have come up with a solution that's really, really, I think, very good
The most minute thing, just a tiny little change
Always pushing me to do the right thing! Terrible!
Horrible, dangerous and wrong decision.......
That was more than a mistake. That was done purposely. OK? That was not a mistake. That was done purposely.
My I.Q. is one of the highest -and you all know it! Please don't feel so stupid or insecure,it's not your fault
I've had tremendous success. I think I've done a lot.
I wish, uh, I wish the first time it was done correctly.
I beat 16 very talented people in -- and I've never done this before.
That makes me smart.
Since I love what I do, I do it vigorously and I do it better.
There's nothing to love, it's a disaster, folks.
Nobody could have done what I've done with so little appreciation. So much work!
Major rescue operations underway!
